version_description:
IT'S AN EGG HUNT!
- Find 20 hidden eggs and unlock the Rare Bunny Kong! If you already have Bunny, you'll get 500 coins instead!

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

NEW KONGS
- By popular demand, Cats are here! We've also moved the old cat to be with the rest, and put a new Fluffy Kong in it's place. What could it be?

EVENTS
- Every week or so a new event will now appear! It could be anything, so stay tuned...

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

At long last... it's KongME!

MAKE YOUR OWN KONGS
- With KongME you can turn your whole family into Kongs... even your pets!
- Take pictures, record sounds and make all kinds of crazy Kongs!
- 50 fun Accessories to win!
- Stay tuned for more KongME Accessories and improvements coming soon!

We can't wait to see your KongME creations!

30 NEW ACCESSORIES
- Get your style on with hair, glasses and beards for your KongME creations.

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY!
- It's Sling Kong's 2nd Birthday and YOU'RE the one getting the presents! To celebrate we're throwing a huge week-long party with a different game event taking place each day!

30 NEW ACCESSORIES
- Enjoy some of the wonderful and colourful cultures of our world, past and present with this new KongME accessory pack! From a Knight's suit of armor through to a Japanese Geisha outfit this accessory pack has something for everyone!

NEW THEME
Get ready to Blast Off! Sling past shooting stars and stellar spirals in this outer space spectacle!

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

NEW KONGS!
We've returned to the wild with 5 new Jungle Kongs for you to collect!

BUG FIXES
- Fixed issues with Hebrew text drawing incorrectly.
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

NEW HATS!
Every Kong dreamt of being a Fireman or a Policeman growing up. Now you can too with our new set of career hats to collect.

BUG FIXES
- Fixes the Prize Machine not getting new prizes correctly.

NEW SCARY KONGS!
It's Halloween and 5 more spooky Kongs have arrived!

HALLOWEEN EVENTS!
Be sure to play during the days leading up to Halloween to take part in some frightfully fun events!

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

NEW ADVENTURE KONGS!
5 NEW Adventure Kongs have dropped in for some fun! Collect them now before they head out on their next quest!

HOLIDAY EVENTS!
Season's Greetings! We've got plenty of Winter Wonderland events lined up for this holiday period!

Thanks for playing Sling Kong! We had a great year and we'll be back with even more updates in 2018!

- Protostar

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

NEW KONGS
We're going back to Africa with a new group of wild Kongs to collect! Go on safari with a Cheetah, frolic with a Meerkat and run with a Rhino in this exotic new set!

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

NEW KONGS
- Old McDonald had an.... Alpaca!? We're back on the farm this update with a brand new set of Kongs to collect including Donkey, Turkey and Scarecrow!

NEW OBSTACLE
- Watch out for the ferocious new Snapdragon! This pesky plant will gobble up your Kong in one bite!

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

BUG FIXES
- Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

NEW HATS - Beanies!
It’s getting chilly in Kong Land, time to rug up! A new set of warm and stylish Beanies are available to collect for each and every Kong!

NEW OBSTACLE - Temple Turners!
These ancient obstacles twist and turn to tease our timid Kongs! Time it just right to traverse past these troublesome turners!

UPDATED PRIVACY
Privacy is very important to us so we’ve ensured that Sling Kong conforms to all new EU privacy laws.

NEW KONGS
Brrrrrr, it's getting cold in here! A brand new set of Ice Age Kongs have arrived, collect them all before they become extinct!

NEW HATS!
The Kongs love playing dress up! Collect a new magical themed hat for each Kong including a Wizard's Hat, Unicorn's Horn and Fairy Wings!

NEW KONGS
Fantastic floral Kongs have just sprouted in the prize machine! Collect the entire Flowers Set including Daisy, Orchid, Rose and more!

New Events!
Stay tuned for some amazing events coming up this year including Chinese New Year, Valentine's Day and Rio Carnival.

New Events!
We hoped you enjoyed the Chinese New Year event! Stay tuned for more amazing events coming up including Valentine's Day and Rio Carnival!
